name: Gaia, the Citadel Knight
text:
1 Dark monster or 1 Light monster 
 When this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Gaia Knight Dragon Hatchery" from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this face-up card; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster using monsters you control as material. You can only use each effect of "Gaia, the Citadel Knight" once per turn.
